summary: This document is a letter from Jeffrey Epstein authorizing Harry Beller to have signing authority on the account of JEGE, Inc. It is addressed to Amanda Kirby at Deutsche Bank and indicates a formal request for banking authority.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual authorizing signing authority for the account of JEGE, Inc.

persons.name: Harry Beller
persons.context: Harry Beller is granted signing authority on the account of JEGE, Inc. by Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is the recipient of the letter at Deutsche Bank regarding the signing authority.

connections.description: Jeffrey Epstein authorizes Harry Beller to have signing authority on his company's account.
Jeffrey Epstein communicates with Amanda Kirby regarding banking matters.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY 10154
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein authorized Harry Beller to have signing authority on the account of JEGE, Inc.
The letter is addressed to Amanda Kirby at Deutsche Bank.
